DOC.brief_summary: The study will aim to describe and evaluate the effect of chronic beetroot juice supplementation on acute mountain sickness symptoms and exercise in a hypoxic environment. It is hypothesized that beetroot supplementation will decrease acute mountain sickness and increase exercise performance.
DOC.brief_title: The Effect of Chronic Nitrate Supplementation on Acute Mountain Sickness and Exercise Performance in Hypoxia
DOC.criteria: Women only: Regular menstrual cycle or postmenopausal Stayed at altitude above 2500m in the last 6 months Traveled to altitude above 2500m in the last 2 months Unable to give informed consent Unstable medical condition.
